## Description
A clear and concise description of the bug.

## Seed
Paste the **SEED** shown in-game.

## Floor
The floor number where the bug occurred.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Start game with the seed above
2. Reach floor X
3. Do this action
4. Observe bug

## Expected Behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened.
